title: Forget giving out candy, book a last-minute trip: JetBlue has $31 Halloween flights
text:
CLOSE These tips compiled by Business Insider will help make your next flight flawless. 10Best Editors, USA TODAY 10Best

JetBlue Airways is offering a "wicked" deal this spooky season: $31 domestic flights on Halloween.

They're calling it "The Monster Sale."

Wednesday and Thursday only, travelers can book a one-way Halloween flight anywhere in the United States, including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. All JetBlue domestic flights will be priced at $31.

The travel has to take place Oct. 31.

The reduced fares will be available while supplies last. The offer does not apply to flights booked previously and is not valid for Mint seats, JetBlue's premium class.

So maybe leave out a bowl of candy and celebrate the scariest day of the year by taking a quick trip to see a haunted house, visit Witch City or take on a 10-hour haunted tour challenge.

Follow Morgan Hines on Twitter: @MorganEmHines.

description: JetBlue Airways is offering a 'wicked' deal: $31 domestic flights on Halloween.
